title: Russia Remains Open to Ukraine Settlement Talks, Interested in Continuing Them - Kremlin
description: MOSCOW (Sputnik) - Russia remains open to negotiations on a settlement in Ukraine and is interested in continuing them, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said on Friday.
content:
